sect1.title: WORKUNIT

row.entry: A string constant containing the NAMED option scalar value to return.
Optional. The value type of the named scalar value result to return.

sect1.para: The WORKUNIT function returns values stored in the workunit. Given no parameters, it returns the unique workunit identifier (WUID) WUID for the currently executing workunit, otherwise it returns the NAMED option result from the OUTPUT or DISTRIBUTION action DISTRIBUTION action .
